alert.note: Alert for Indiana; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 24 at 5:50PM EDT until March 25 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO NOON EDT SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM TO 11 PM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the second Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Jefferson PA and Indiana Counties. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 3 AM to Noon EDT Saturday. For the second Wind Advisory, from 4 PM to 11 PM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
